name: pour balls
description:
tap to pour balls into next hexagon and not spill them all over the place

Simple but challenging arcade game with a goal of dropping and catching as many balls from one rotating container to another without losing them. Time your moves to align containers perfectly, open the door in the right position to get all the balls transported.


CATCH ALL THE BALLS FOR A PERFECT DROP
Move as many balls as possible to advance to the next container
